[[File:Flag_begging.gif|thumb]]
__TOC__
==Description==
Begging allows a player to ask NPCs for gold. The amount of gold given to the player is so low that it's considered a useless skill. Begging lowers Karma by a small amount. 

==Recommended Leveling==
:Activate the skill and Target an NPC
